alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:17AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe and southwestern Wayne Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belleville, or near Canton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Romulus around 1130 AM EDT. Taylor around 1140 AM EDT. Flat Rock around 1150 AM EDT. Trenton around 1155 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Brownstown Township, Gibraltar, New Boston, South Rockwood, Riverview, Rockwood, Wayne, Willow, Ecorse and Allen Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
